lines.text: Wrinkled, wrinkled little star... hope they never see the scars.
This is life's ultimate cruelty. It offers us a taste of youth and vitality, and then it makes us witness our own decay.
Could you just not breathe?
Bottoms up!
[Madeline drinks the potion]
Now, a warning.
NOW a warning?
[Helen has a gaping hole in her abdomen]
You're a fraud, Helen! You're a walking lie and I can see right through you.
Ernest... my ass! I can see MY ASS!
Where did you put my wife?
She's dead, sir. They took her to the morgue.
The morgue? She'll be FURIOUS!
'Til death do us part! Well, you girls are dead. And I'm parting.
[Helen pours alcohol all over Madeline's car and then dumps the bottles inside, revealing dozens of bottles and alcohol everywhere]
We'll make it look like she's had just a little bit too much to drink...

I tell you what, kids, it's, uh, odd thing here. Your wrist, uh, far as I can tell, is, uh, fractured in three places. Uh, and you've shattered, uh, two vertebrae, though I can't be certain without an X-ray... The bone protrusion through the skin - that's not a good sign. You're body temperature is below 80, and your, your, your heart's stopped beating.
What the hell does that mean?
Exactly! What... what... I'm going to get a second opinion.
[the doctor leaves in a hurry]
Well, it could be worse.
Oh, gosh, I'm glad you came. I didn't know if you would. I spoke to my PR woman and she said Madeleine Ashton goes to the opening of an envelope. Oh, those people can be so cruel!
Mmmm.
I fired her.

[pleased]
Oh!
Well, I almost fired her.
Oh ok! Well if she's not dead, you tell her to come down here, come right up to me and kiss me on the...
Kiss you on the what?
Mad?
Hel...
Oh, for Christ's sake, at least lie quickly!
I'm trying to!
How about a nice colagen buff?
"A colagen buff"? You might as well ask me to wash with soap and water!
I could do your make-up myself...
Make-up is POINTLESS! It does nothing anymore! Are you even listening to me? Do you even care? You stand there with your 22-year- old skin and your tits like ROCKS and laugh at me...
[sobs]
On guard, BITCH!
[Helen has a gaping hole in her abdomen after being shot into a pool]
Look at me, Ernest! Just look at me! I'm soaking wet!
[Helen and Madeleine shatter into pieces after falling down stairs]
Do you remember where you parked the car?
She was a homebreaker. She was a man-eater. And she was a *bad* actress.
She's dead!
She is? Oh. These are the moments that make life worth living.

[at Helen's book party]
Have you seen her yet?
What a joke. She's not even here.
Wait. Look over there.

[a heavy-set woman stands surrounded by people]
Oh! Looks as though she's lost a few pou-
[the heavy set lady moves out of the way to reveal the incredibly thin Helen Sharp]
[Lisle has just stabbed Ernest's finger with the dagger]
Ah! Wha-what are you doing?
I'm loving you.
[after seeing her transformation]
I'm a girl!
[after seeing Mad]
It's alive!
[Cut line]
And it's beautiful...
[Lisle scolds one of her "boys"]
Make some room for my friend, for Chrissake. But... keep your ass handy.
You're scared as Hell... of yourself. Of the body you once knew.
I beg your pardon?
I am the one who understands. I am the one who knows your secret.
You're a powerful sexual being, Ernest.
I am?
Yes, you are. If I never told you before, it was because I wasn't the sort of girl who could say the word "sexual" without blushing. Well I can now. Sexual... sensual... sexy... sex... sex... sex...
[about his wife]
Is it up yet?
You're dressed. Special occasion?
Look at you. You have a... waist.
She married a brilliant surgeon, and turned him into an undertaker.
Madeleine! I need to speak to Madeleine!
She's not here.
Oh, thank god.
Drink that potion, and you'll never grow even one day older. Don't drink it, and continue to watch yourself rot.
[Lisle demonstrates the potion]
Check ok?
Fine.

Go on... Drink it... It is the completion of your life's work. You gave other people youth and wasted your own! Drink. And you will be able to work again forever! Drink... drink, Dr. Menville. You owe yourself another chance! Drink! It's the right choice! The *only* choice! Drink! SEMPRE VIVE! LIVE FOREVER!
Then what?
What?
Then what happens?
What?
I don't want to live forever. I mean, it sounds good, but what am I gonna do? What if I get bored?
What?
And what if I get lonely? Who am I gonna hang around with, Madeleine and Helen?
By the time they perform the autopsy, the narconal will be completely dissolved leaving only traces of alcohol. She'll be classified as just "another drunk-driver". They'll check her blood alcohol.

[Coroner picks up charred hand with bottle]
.40... She had it coming.
[Drops hand, bottle brakes]
And think nothing more of it.
The case is closed, Madeline is dead, and we're free!

[after the sample of potion]
Oh my god...
Oh! Thank you!

[From trailer]
Dead? Ernest is dead? Everybody's dead!
I just want you to know one thing...
[Madeleine points gun at Helen]
You brought this on yourself.
Madeleine!
[Madeleine shoots Helen and Ernest screams]
How old would you guess I am? C'mon, don't try to flatter me.
Thirty-eight?
[Lisle Von Rhoman glares at her]
TWENTY-eight... no, twenty-three...
Mr.Chagall! I'm sorry, Mr.Chagall. I'm really, really sorry.
Anna, don't talk, just go away. Leave us alone, I don't want to look at you anymore.
Oh, okay.
Thank you so much.

[reading the title of Helen's new book]
"Forever Young?"...
I like that title.

[Cackling]
Ah, forever young... and eternally fat...
He won't get far. Not at his age.
Is this an angel I see before me?
Oh, it's you.
Fine, dear, thank you, like a rock.
I will not speak to you 'til you put your head on straight.
I'm completely alone.
Dakota...
Actually... Completely isn't quite what I meant.
We are creatures of the spring, you and I.
You're sitting there, you're talking to me, but you're dead!
Ernest, ask me to go. Ask me to leave this house immediately!
You just got here!
You have no talent for poverty.
Do you know that they do to soft, bald, overweight Republicans in prison, Ernest?
You can't raise an eyebrow without major surgery!
You should learn not to compete with me. I always win!
You may have always won, but you never played fair!
Who cares how I played? I won!
You are like Don Quixote, tilting at Nature's windmills.
[Lisle stabs his finger]
What are you doing?
I'm loving you.
But you'll never grow old!
Yes, but everybody else will! I'll have to watch everyone around me die. I don't think this is right. This is not a dream. This is a nightmare!
Well, from now on, I'm going to be the kind of idiot I want to be!

Go on... Drink it... It is the completion of your life's work. You gave other people youth, and wasted your own! Drink. And you will be able to work again- forever! Drink... Drink, Dr. Menville... You owe yourself another chance! Drink! It's the right choice! The *only* choice! Drink! SEMPRE VIVE! LIVE FOREVER!
[Crash of thunder and lightning]

[Emerges from her pool wearing only high heels]
I hope you don't mind that Harry and Dick had to dress you... You were inproperly attired, for the occasion.
What occasion?
I'm throwing a party upstairs... I throw one every Spring, for my clients.
All right... ok... what do you want with me?
For you... I'd like to give a present... The gift of life and youth, forever...
I am sorry, but the plasma separation is a very traumatic process to the body! Our policy clearly prohibits more than one in a six-month period.
So? It's been nearly that long already.
Miss Ashton, you had one three weeks ago.

[Helen throws a Spade at Madeleine, who catches it]
En garde! *Bitch*!
Girls, girls! Let's just calm down! I'm sure we can settle this peacefully and nego... WHOA!
Ernest! You pushed me down the stairs.

[after she discovers Dakota has a girl over]
Who is the little piece of meat?
[upon discovering her neck has twisted a complete 180 degrees]
Ernest... my ass! I can *see*... my ASS!
And there's something really wrong with your neck too.
I... fell down the stairs
Whoopsie!
You have got to forget about her! You have got to erase her from your mind. You have to completely eliminate any tra...
What?
You have to completely eliminate...
You're right.
What?
You're absolutely right!
[after being shot into a pond, by Madeline]
That was totally uncalled for.
[Rose is serving breakfast in bed to Madeline Ashton]
Good morning, madam. You look absolutely marvelous.
Hey, wait a minute. Aren't you forgetting something?
Well, it's only Thursday - you told me just to say it...
Well, never mind that. I think I need you to say it every morning.
Very well. "Oh, madam! You look younger every day!"
Thank you, Rose. Thank you very much.
Tell me, doctor. Do you think I'm starting to need you?
Drink it!
You have to!
We need you!
[Ernest lets go]

[Lisle is about to give Madeline a potion that grants eternal youth and beauty]
But you must make me a promise. The secret that we share must never become public. You may continue your career for ten years. Ten years of perfect, unchanged beauty. But at the end of that time, before people start to become suspicious, you have to disappear from public view forever. You can retire, you can stage your own phony death, or... as one of my clients simply said, I want to be alone.
No. She...
[Lisle nods]
[Madeline Ashton is requesting another plasma separation]
Are you listening to me? Do you even care? You just stand there with your 22-year-old skin and your tits like rocks and laugh, and...
[sobs]
